Abstract.Para: Returns an autoreleased string containing the localized name for the specified compression type.

Definition.Para: A TIFF compression type. NSTIFFCompression types are described in “Constants”.

ResultDescription.Para: A localized name for compression or nil if compression is unrecognized.

Discussion.Para: When implementing a user interface for selecting TIFF compression types, use getTIFFCompressionTypes:count: to get the list of supported compression types, then use this method to get the localized names for each compression type.

Availability.AvailabilityItem: Available in OS X v10.0 and later.
